text: Randall is a populated place situated in Montgomery County, New York. It is a hamlet in the northeast part of Root on New York State Route 5S. It has an estimated elevation of above sea level. The area where Randall is now was originally named Yatesville. The name of Randall was adopted in 1863 at the suggestion of the first postmaster.https://books.google.com/books?id=MeopAQAAMAAJ&vq;=Lounsbery&pg;=PA342#v=snippet&q;=Lounsbery&f;=false ==References== Category:Hamlets in Montgomery County, New York
title: Randall, New York
